title: The Most Favorite Champion of All Time [Voting Elimination] - QUARTERFINALS, Ahri vs Azir
body:
**UPDATE:**

First of all, last Group Winner is: **Thresh** (590 votes). This time it was very hard and even battle. For a long time Thresh and Teemo had the same votes and every new vote counted. So after decades of battle between these two titans, Thresh decided to buy Oracle Alteration and the tide of battle quickly turned to his favor. So in the end our Lords soul was eaten by Thresh (even tho he doesn't have soul). I might only wonder into what Evilness is Thresh gonna evolve after absorbing Teemo... Well, lets go to last round of the QUARTERFINALS, where we have Ahri vs Azir. **LET THE BEST WIN**.

**Trailer for the Battle:**
[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x_avwGiM3Lk](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x_avwGiM3Lk)

Also please check out my [YouTube Channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMVxkqVcf2KPo8dYfRcchJA) and my [Twitch Channel](https://www.twitch.tv/razyelxgaming) and if you somehow like my content, leave a subcribe/follow, it will make me happy!:)

Thanks for every support!:)

**BASIC INFO:**

Hello,

who is your favorite champion? And who is the most favorite champion of all 137 champions? Let's find out! I've created a bracked of all champions currently in the game. It will be up to you guys to decide who is the BEST champion. 

The **voting will last for 2 days**, then **1 champion with the most votes will make it to next round** and I will create another voting thread for next Group and so on, until there is only 1 winner.

The full Bracked can be found on my [FaceBook](https://www.facebook.com/RazyeLx) / [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RazyeLxGaming) or down below on the next link:

[https://imgur.com/aiwbG82](https://imgur.com/aiwbG82)

So lets get to it. Here are the 2 champions, that made it to Quarterfinals. Vote for your most favorite. Only 1 will make it to next round!:) You don't have your favorite here? Then vote for the one you like the most:)

If you have any questions, just ask:)

PS: Only votes on this thread count. I won't count any comments/votes on other pages, forums, etc.
PSS: You can find results of Round 1 and the results of Round 2 at the end of article in the last following groups
- Group P [HERE](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/BEEpWt0A-the-most-favorite-champion-of-all-time-voting-elimination-group-p)
- Round 2, Group IV. [HERE](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/iEE7vQu9-the-most-favorite-champion-of-all-time-voting-elimination-round-2-group-iv)
- QUARTERFINALS, [Rengar vs Kindred](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/q3vmFmVT-the-most-favorite-champion-of-all-time-voting-elimination-quarterfinals-rengar-vs-kindred)
- QUARTERFINALS, [Jhin vs Kled](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/nuwAQfAA-the-most-favorite-champion-of-all-time-voting-elimination-quarterfinals-jhin-vs-kled)
- QUARTERFINALS, [Teemo vs Thresh](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/ZL491nAR-the-most-favorite-champion-of-all-time-voting-elimination-quarterfinals-teemo-vs-thresh)

RazyeLx

replies.body:
http://promo.na.leagueoflegends.com/assets/shurima/img/content-pages/azir-page/ar-w.jpg
“Arise my soldiers and lead us to victory against this confused fox”

Arise, chicken, arise!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8BHsSx9k8hk&feature=youtu.be&t=5m33s

a vote for azir is a vote for shurima

http://apollo-na-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/1441752106/captain_azir_by_dexistor371-d81g77u.jpg

>http://apollo-na-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/1441752106/captain_azir_by_dexistor371-d81g77u.jpg

>https://i.imgur.com/uQg4I.jpg?nodirect

>https://i.ytimg.com/vi/q5GUXUH4fKk/maxresdefault.jpg

I see...

Effective, but not very graceful, if you don't mind me saying. ~ {{champion:103}}

I'm still immensely shocked by the loss of my favourite champion last quarterfinal. 
I want to curl into my safe space, chew on my thumb and cry.
But I still have a mission to complete, so duty comes first!

Please vote for Azir.
I have never played an Azir game in my life. I do not know what his abilities do, I know nothing of his personality.
But still... choosing the other option scares me.
So, instead of telling you why vote Azir, I shall politely explain to you why NOT to vote Ahri.

My reasons are as follow:

*1.* Social reason
Ahri is the epitome of female objectification. Seeing her in games triggers me immensely. Hearing her laugh makes me want to punch a hole into my CRT screen. Her mere existence pulls feminism 100 years backwards.
Also:
->she is a cat
-> there are other champions in the game with grab abilities
-> you know who likes to grab cats right???

Do YOU want to encourage such behaviour?
If no vote the RIGHT way and choose Azir! {{champion:268}} 

*2.* Aestethical reasons
She is an ugly, nasty woman. Choose a better looking champ for your favourite!

Do YOU want an UGLY champion representing our game???
If no vote the RIGHT way and choose Azir! {{champion:268}} 

*3.* Practical reasons

Ahri is the reason we don't get the skins we want.
YOU heard me right! She is the reason we don't get the skins we want.

Everyone wanted Star Guardian Urgot, right???
YOU want to know why we did not get him?
I will tell you why!
According to my (completely real and definitely not totally made up) source in Rito Gmaes SG Urgot was almost finished ULTIMATE skin, but officials decided to cancel it and put Ahri in his place. 
She was more popular they said.
And you know what else hangs in the balance?
DRAGONMASTER SWAIN
YOU heard me right!!1!
According to my  (completely real and definitely not totally made up) source in Rito Gmaes the word is if Ahri wins this fan contest SHE will get the dragonmaster skin and Swain will receive nothing.

Do YOU want another Ahri skin?
Do YOU want NEVER to experience the glory of Dragonmaster Swain???
If no vote the RIGHT way and choose Azir! {{champion:268}}
i hate ahri as a character but after these bs reasons i voted ahri to spite you
I voted for Azir because I didn't want to vote for Ahri, but if I had read their comment first, I would have voted for Ahri. :T
Almost makes me regret voting for Azir... Almost.
Same.

Ahri is a fox and foxes =/= cats.
They are related to dogs much closer.
I feel like people are voting for azir so ahri wont win... Not to make azir win..

> [{quoted}](name=WyvernEgg,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=sp8ZOq6E,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2017-09-23T00:24:41.038+0000)
>
> I feel like people are voting for azir so ahri wont win... Not to make azir win..

I mean, it is probably both. Azir is an interesting champion with a cool theme/voiceover/animations.

No reason to assume everyone is out to get you when your champion is losing. People have to pick the one the prefer. So far, more people like Azir.

I don't care that she's losing. The less people that play my main the better. Heck I think Azir is awesome. But I really do think people are picking azir just so ahri wont win... It's kinda depressing honestly.

> [{quoted}](name=WyvernEgg,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=sp8ZOq6E,comment-id=000a00000001,timestamp=2017-09-23T02:11:38.298+0000)
>
> I don't care that she's losing. The less people that play my main the better. Heck I think Azir is awesome. But I really do think people are picking azir just so ahri wont win... It's kinda depressing honestly.

I mean, think of it this way.

They are supposed to vote for the champion they like MORE.

If they don't like Ahri, they will vote for Azir, since they like him more.

That is the point of this whole thing.

Nah, 
I picked Azir cause I hate Ahri

I voted for Azir mainly because I like the story with him and Xerath.  I think that backstory is much more interesting than Ahri's.

In terms of kits, I hate them both {{sticker:sg-shisa}}
I'm pretty sure people are only picking azir because they don't want ahri to win XD
SHURIMA
http://i.imgur.com/hYjSqL9.gif?noreply
I'm really surprised people is not voting for the waifu and voting azir O.O
Because they want Ahri to lose, not Azir to win.
Especially after all the fanservice Ahri got these past months, a lot of people are kind of sick of her
I mean, she got a skin. Outside of the "omg op no nerfs" thing a while ago, those are the only two things to deal with her this year. I guess the vastaya update too.

> [{quoted}](name=NineTailedMystic,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=sp8ZOq6E,comment-id=000f000000000000,timestamp=2017-09-23T18:49:42.052+0000)
>
> I mean, she got a skin. Outside of the "omg op no nerfs" thing a while ago, those are the only two things to deal with her this year. I guess the vastaya update too.

Here.... Let me fill you in:

1. Wins every hottest female champion poll.
2. Has THEE most rule 34 content then any other champion.  That includes Sona and Miss Fortune.
3. Updated lore that includes not 1 but 2 extra stories.
4. Is in the "Art Of League Of Legends" book.
5. Is the protagonist of the "New Dawn" Cinematic.
6. Is in most promotional artwork.  (Almost to the point if not already superseding Katarina.)
7. Became the selected champion as the protagonist of the new star guardian skins.  (With new voice overs.)
8. Became an announcer on both summoners rift and the invasion game mode.
9. Got another promotional video in anime form for the new star guardian content.
10. Got more coverage based on her development called "Origins: Ahri."
11. Was in the Top 8 of /r/leagueoflegends best champion contest.
12. Is in the Top 8 of this best champion contest and the only female champion left in the running.

All these reasons alone are enough to trigger the ever living shit out of those that think she is the biggest mistake that has ever happened to the game and none of it even has anything to do with her as champion in-game which is another whole can of worms.

**[Removed by Moderation]**

So her losing here will probably at least help them sleep better night.
Really? That sad little king of that sad little wasteland is winning? {{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}
You're just jealous that you have to sustain off the lusting souls of horny teenagers while he gets to power a whole empire.
{{champion:268}} {{champion:268}}  SHURIMA {{champion:268}} {{champion:268}}

Fact is, my friends, is that Azir...

Simply has better memes
Shurima needs more votes!
azir is off strong but will he keep the lead with the hundreds of ahri mains on boards

> [{quoted}](name=UnboundHades,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=sp8ZOq6E,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-09-22T23:10:45.108+0000)
>
> azir is off strong but will he keep the lead with the hundreds of ahri mains on boards

Lol! Ahri doesn't stand a chance.

There are FAR more Ahri haters here then there are lovers.  She had a good run and made it to the top 8 and is the last female champion standing but her run is over.

Started playing azir recently,excited for the rework. (haterz incoming)

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/IdNSdXX6-0E/hqdefault.jpg


SHURIMA! YOUR EMPEROR HAS RETURNED!

BTW : what happens to the champ who wins?

Vote it up guyz if possible, so we get more votes.

Also if you are bored, come visit my [YouTube Channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMVxkqVcf2KPo8dYfRcchJA) and if you somehow liked my videos leave a like and subscribe, it would make me happy:P

Thanks for every support!:)

PS: New trailer for current battle!:)

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x_avwGiM3Lk](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x_avwGiM3Lk)
(shurima intensifies)
http://i.imgur.com/hYjSqL9.gif?noreply
DON'T LET A SLUTTY FOX BEAT AN EMPEROR BOARDS, I STILL HAVE SOME FAITH IN YOU!

Okay. Now you're just being too harsh.

It's okay to dislike Ahri. But the poor girl doesn't deserved to be bashed every second.
I mean... Her defining characteristic is that she whores herself out to men to steal their souls...
Umm no. Have you seen her new lore?
who would vote jhin instead of kled?
People who are wrong.
People who appreciate the true beauty of the art of four.
Three! Three! Three!
How dare...
You...
The order is given!
The more I look at this, the more I realize you could not pick any other two champions with more similar-looking names. They only have 1 letter difference.

Jinx and Jhin are just as close, though.
Fun fact: Jhin's name was originally spelled Jin. But they figured that this would be way too similar to Jinx, so they changed it to Jhin.
{{champion:268}} azir

this won't be a contest, surprised ahri even came this far.

Well even though i'd rather have seen Teemo win let's hope thresh can bring it home with this cancer in the top 4.
